name: Mister Fantastic

abilities.name: Stretchy Punch
abilities.details: Stretches his arms for long-range melee attacks.

abilities.name: Elastic Grapple
abilities.details: Stretches arm to grapple onto ledges or terrain for quick movement.

abilities.name: Bounce Pad / Containment
abilities.details: Shapes his body into a bouncy pad for allies or a temporary bubble to briefly contain an enemy.

ultimate.name: Think Tank
ultimate.effect: Deploys a device creating a field: Buffs ally ability cooldowns, slows enemy projectiles.
ultimate.details: Utilizes a complex invention to control the battlefield strategically.

passives.name: Malleable Body
passives.details: High resistance to physical damage and knockback effects. Can flatten to fit under obstacles?

teamups.effect: Ultimate ('Think Tank') duration slightly increased when near FF members.

lore: Reed Richards, a scientific genius and leader of the Fantastic Four. Exposure to cosmic rays granted him the ability to stretch and reshape his body into almost any form.
